snippet: Detective Chief Inspector April Casburn is accused of seeking to sell confidential police information to a British tabloid owned by Rupert Murdoch.
abstract: Trial begins for Scotland Yard Detective Chief Inspector April Casburn, who is charged with seeking to sell confidential police information to tabloid that Rupert Murdoch ordered shut as phone-hacking scandal erupted around his British newspaper empire.
lead_paragraph: Detective Chief Inspector April Casburn is accused of seeking to sell confidential police information to a British tabloid owned by Rupert Murdoch.

headline.seo: Trial Begins for April Casburn, Scotland Yard Officer, in Phone-Hacking Scandal
headline.main: Trial Begins for Scotland Yard Officer in Phone-Hacking Scandal
headline.print_headline: Trial Begins for Scotland Yard Officer in Phone-Hacking Scandal

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
